parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: The host name or IP address of the elk alarm system.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The port to connect to on the elk alarm system.

parameter.name: userCode
parameter.label: User Code
parameter.description: The user code for access to the elk alarm data.

parameter.name: useSSL
parameter.label: Use Secure Port
parameter.description: When enabled the binding will connect assuming a secure port rather than an insecure one. Username and password required.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: User name for secure port connections.
